items.title: Implement Analytics Dashboard
items.description: Develop an analytics dashboard within the project management tool to display key project metrics and performance indicators.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays at least 5 key metrics such as task completion rate, project progress, overdue tasks, resource utilization, and budget usage.
Data on the dashboard updates in real-time or within a maximum delay of 5 minutes.
Users can filter metrics by project, team, and date range.
Dashboard is accessible from the main navigation menu.
Visualizations include charts and graphs for better data interpretation.
dependencies: Project data collection and storage module
non_functional: Dashboard loads within 3 seconds for datasets up to 10,000 records.
Responsive design for desktop and tablet devices.

notes: Assumed that the analytics dashboard is a core feature of the tool and requires real-time or near real-time data updates. No prior context provided on specific metrics, so common project KPIs were used.
